SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「よっぽどそうするのが好きなのね」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,0)@「よっぽどそうするのが好きなのね」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `理樹@「なに？　むしゃくしゃすることでもあった？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `理樹@「なに？　むしゃくしゃすることでもあった？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `理树@「怎么了？是在烦闷什么事情吗？」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `理樹@「なに？　なんなのっ？　こわいよ!?」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `理樹@「なに？　なんなのっ？　こわいよ!?」
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `理树@「怎么了？到底怎么回事？好可怕啊!?」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `理樹@「ちゃんと言ってよっ、僕直すよっ!?」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `理樹@「ちゃんと言ってよっ、僕直すよっ!?」
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `理树@「请好好告诉我！我会改的!?」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `理樹@「やめてよっ、自分を傷つけないで!!」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `理樹@「やめてよっ、自分を傷つけないで!!」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `理樹@「だめだ…僕には止められない…」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `理樹@「だめだ…僕には止められない…」
`$(1,1)@ "Let us see what you guys have."
`$(1,1)@ "This is a good way to kill time."
`$(1,1)@ "I'm going to erase all of you."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「秘宝はどこ？　吐いちゃいなさいよ」
`$(1,0)@「ことごとく消し去ってやる」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "We'll snuff out every last one of you."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「大人しく消えればいいのよ」
`$(1,0)@「そろそろ本気でいこうかしら？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Guess it's time for us to go all out?"

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「今の理樹くんはすごいわよ？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Aren't you aware you're doing a real good job here?"

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「今の理樹くんなら大丈夫よ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "You're good enough now to make it through this."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「理樹くん、様になってきたじゃない」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Riki-kun, you're now really good at that."
`$(1,1)@ "You sure you wanna challenge us, the strongest team ever?"

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あたしたちに勝てると思って？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Do you really think you can beat us?"

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あたしたちを舐めてるわね」
`$(1,0)@「理樹くん、やっちゃいなさい」

SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "It won't take a second to finish them all."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「理樹くんは今大変お怒りよ」
`$(1,0)@「その勇気だけは認めてあげるわ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Well, I respect that you are willing to face us."
`$(1,1)@ "Think again because you're not as strong as you think you are."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「理樹くんも何か言ってやんなさいよ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Riki-kun, you should also say something to them just like I do."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「理樹くん、あまり前に出ないで」
`$(1,0)@「えーーと、よん、ろく…？　いや、なな、いやいやろく、あーえーと…」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Well, four, six? Er, ten... ten... ugh...!"

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「いち？　いや、あー、じゅう…じゅう…ああぁ…！」
`$(1,0)@「さ…さん…さん…きゅう？　いや、はち、あっ、いちっ、あーじゅうっ！」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Th... three... three... nine? No, eight, uh, one, err, ten!"

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「理樹くん、あなた才能あるわよ」
`$(1,0)@「理樹くん、あたしの目に間違いはなかったわ…」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Riki-kun, I was right to bring you here."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「理樹くん、スパイに転職すべきよ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「理树君，你应该去当间谍才对。」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「理樹くん、あなた、実はすでにどこかのスパイなんじゃないの？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Riki-kun, aren't you already working as a spy for some organization?"
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「理树君，你是不是已经在哪个组织当间谍了？」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「理樹くん、あなた、あたしよりすごくない？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「理树君，你是不是比我还厉害？」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「理樹くん、あなたが敵じゃなくてよかったわ…」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Riki-kun, I'm glad you're not my enemy..."
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「理树君，幸好你不是我的敌人…」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「なによっ、そうよっ、あなたよりあたしのほうがへたよっ！」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "What? That's right! I'm worse than you!"
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「什么啦，对啊，我就是不如你啦！」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「いい気になってんじゃないわよっ！」
`$(1,0)@「なによっ、そんなに射撃が上手いほうが偉いわけ!?」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "What? You think you're better than me just because you're better at shooting than me?"
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「什么嘛，射击厉害就了不起吗！？」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「理樹くんひとりでも勝てそうね」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Riki-kun, I think you can take care of them on your own."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「ぜんっぜん本気になれないんだけど」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I don't even need to get half serious."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あたしを倒そうなんて…馬鹿じゃないの？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Did you really think you'd beat me...? How dumb."
`$(1,1)@ "I don't want to waste my bullets."
`$(1,1)@ "I think we can beat them with our bare hands."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あんたらどれだけ弱いのよ」

SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Jeez, this is a waste of time."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「ぜんっぜん本気になれないんですけど」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I don't even need to get half serious."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「数学の問題を解くより易しいわね」
`$(1,0)@「あたしを倒そうなんて…あほね」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "It's ridiculous for you to even try to beat me."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「暇だからラーメン食ってきたわよ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I ate ramen because I had nothing else to do."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「退屈だったからカツサンド買いにいってたわ。理樹くん食べる？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I went out to buy pork cutlet sandwiches because I was bored. Riki-kun, you want some?"
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「无聊到去买了猪排三明治。理树君，要吃吗？」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「退屈だったから５５１の肉まん買ってきたわ。理樹くん食べる？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I went out to buy Go Go Ichi's steamed meat buns because I was bored. Riki-kun, you want some?"
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「无聊到去买了‘551’的肉包。理树君，要吃吗？」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「退屈だったからカレー作ってきたわ。理樹くん食べる？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I cooked curry because I was bored. Riki-kun, you want some?"
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「无聊到做了咖喱。理树君，要吃吗？」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「退屈だったから広島対横浜戦見てきたわ。地味な一戦だったわ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Since I was bored, I went to see a baseball game between Hirosima and Yokohama. It was nothing special."
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「无聊到去看了广岛对横滨的比赛。真是一场无趣的比赛啊。」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「退屈だったから巨人阪神伝統の一戦を見てきたわ。見応えのある一戦だったわ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Since I was bored, I went to see a baseball game between the Giants and the Tigers. That really was something else."
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「无聊到看了巨人对阪神的传统对决。真是一场精彩的比赛啊。」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「暇だからデパ地下で試食しまくってきたわ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I was so bored, I went to try food samples in the basement of a department store."
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「无聊到去百货地下试吃了个遍。」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「その制服、たくさん持ってるのね」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Looks like they have a lot of uniforms."
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「那套制服，真是多得不得了啊。」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あたし途中から読書してたわ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I started reading halfway through the fight."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あたし途中からアイス食べてたわ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I started eating ice cream halfway through the fight."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あたし途中でシャワー浴びてきたわよ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I went to take a shower halfway through the fight."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あたし途中から小説を執筆してたわ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I started writing a novel halfway through the fight."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あたし途中から目つぶってたわ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I closed my eyes halfway through the fight."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あなたたち、そんなのでいいの？」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Are you guys sure you're okay with the way things are?"
`$(1,1)@ "Don't you guys have dreams and aspirations?"
`$(1,1)@ "Is being a shadow that much fun?"
`$(1,1)@ "Don't you guys have any other hobbies?"
`$(1,1)@ "What's the source of those shadows doing?"

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あー、なんかむしゃくしゃするわねっ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Jeez, I'm feeling frustrated for some reason."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「水道管ゲームでもしてたほうが有意義ね」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Playing Waterworks would be much more meaningful."
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「玩水管游戏都比这个有意义。」

SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I think we'd still be able to beat them in Sumo."
`$(1,1)@ "Are there any secretaries among you guys?"
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「你们当中还有书记之类的吗？」

SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Do you guys go to class as you should be?"
`$(1,1)@ "Just how many of them are there..."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「うーん、途中までいい感じだったのにな…」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Hmm, you were doing great until halfway through."
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「嗯——明明到中途都很顺利的说…」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「とっとと消えちゃいなさいよ！」

SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "I'm going to make you go away!"

SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `$(1,1)@「你们这些家伙，统统给我消失！」

SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Stop bothering us for a bit, would you?"
`$(1,1)@ "Get the hell out of our way!"

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「はんっ、馬鹿にしないでもらいたいわね」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Ha, I'm much better than you think I am."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「あっはは、負けてやーんのっ」

SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Get the hell outta our way, you bastards!"

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「こんなとこで立ち止まってなんかいられないのよ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "We've got no time to stop here."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「ザコごときにやられるかってのっ」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "There's no way you maggots can beat us!"

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「うわ…やったあああぁぁーーーーっ!!」

SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Fools rush in where angels fear to tread♪"

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「理樹くん、やっちゃいなさい」

SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "All right, time to clean up the mess."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「草木も生えそうにないわね」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "This place is now like a desert."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `$(1,0)@「うわっはっはっは！　笑いしか出てこないわ」

SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `$(1,1)@ "Ecstasy... It's about to get to me..."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `時風@「さあ、ゲームを始めようか」
`時風@「そんなところに撃ってどうする」

SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `时风@「你看起来像是静止的一样。」

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `時風@「暇つぶしにもならない」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `Tokikaze@ "You're not even good enough to entertain me."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `時風@「そろそろギブアップか？」

SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `Tokikaze@ "The difference between how strong we are is crystal-clear."

SAYAVOICETEXT.JP: `時風@「闇の執行部をなめるな」
`時風@「闇の執行部をさんざもてあそびやがって」
SAYAVOICETEXT.EN: `Tokikaze@ "You must pay for messing around with the Darkness Executives."
SAYAVOICETEXT.Translation: `时风@「敢戏弄暗之执行部，就等着付出代价吧。」
